content: this is my first time to make a written pattern so i appreciate any feedback i d like to introduce you to oscar the elder this tissue box cover also doubles as a place to put your glasses when you are not wearing them details skill level intermediate us terminology materials red heart super savers worsted weight #4 yarn 100% acrylic 198 g/7 oz 333 meters/364 yards skein 1 skein i love this yarn worsted weight #4 yarn 100% acrylic 199 g/7 oz 325 meters/355 yards skein 1 skein of black 1 skein of white 1 skein of medium blue stonewash print i love this yarn worsted weight #4 yarn 100% acrylic 142 g/5 oz 230 meters/252 yards skein 1 skein 5 5 mm i-9 crochet hook scissors yarn needle size fits a small sized tissue box 4 5 inches wide by 5 inches tall stitches used magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet in the same st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase 2 half_double_crochet in the same st double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain chain-space chain space blo back loop only skip skip st stitch es space space follow me https //www instagram com/katyscraftingcorner | instagram https //www pinterest com/katycraftingcorner | pinterest ⓒ 2023 katy s crafting corner | kathryn nelson | all rights reserved
